name: Solar Shot
description:
A local multiplayer game made for Create Jam Fall 2022. 

A (or any other button) to shoot. B to taunt. Alt+F4 to exit.

An uncontrollable power source- the sun, is setting upon a desolate sandy wasteland, where solar robots roam. You only have a short amount of time to shoot your rival- and you need to charge as much as you can to be able to shoot.

Who will shoot first? And will it be worth it?
